annotations.annotation: Effective date: November 1, 1975 (2:24 Md. R. 1479; 2:26 Md. R. 1158)
Chapter revised effective April 1, 1977 (4:8 Md. R. 636); August 3, 1981 (8:15 Md. R. 1310)
Regulations .01—.08 repealed and new Regulations .01—.09 adopted effective June 27, 1988 (15:13 Md. R. 1557)
Regulations .01, .03, and .07 amended as an emergency provision effective December 20, 1988 (15:26 Md. R. 2978); amended permanently effective June 26, 1989 (16:12 Md. R. 1337)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective October 23, 1998 (25:23 Md. R. 1694); amended permanently effective April 5, 1999 (26:7 Md. R. 545)
Regulation .02 amended as an emergency provision effective October 23, 1998 (25:23 Md. R. 1694); amended permanently effective April 5, 1999 (26:7 Md. R. 545)
Regulation .02D adopted effective February 26, 1996 (23:4 Md. R. 273)
Regulation .03 amended effective April 5, 1999 (26:7 Md. R. 545)
Regulation .03C amended as an emergency provision effective December 15, 1999 (27:2 Md. R. 141); emergency status extended at 27:5 Md. R. 578); emergency status expired June 16, 2000
Regulation .04A amended effective April 8, 1996 (23:7 Md. R. 554); January 31, 2005 (32:2 Md. R. 147)

Regulation .05 amended as an emergency provision effective October 1, 2003 (30:22 Md. R. 1575); emergency status expired April 1, 2004; amended permanently effective September 13, 2004 (31:18 Md. R. 1351)
Regulation .07 amended as an emergency provision effective October 23, 1998 (25:23 Md. R. 1694); amended permanently effective April 5, 1999 (26:7 Md. R. 545)
Chapter revised effective August 25, 2008 (35:17 Md. R. 1489)
Chapter repealed effective November 15, 2021 (48:23 Md. R. 981)
